name: Knife to Meet Yu Again
description:
A small game for Monster Jam 2!

After Yu's adventure in last year's Monster Jam, he's back at it again after recieving an invite to a mysterious party. All of his classic moves are back, and bringing with him is a new set of Knives at his disposal. Mix-and-match his knives to create new effects!

The game is most likely NOT going to be worked on after this. This is merely to test out a new mechanic!

Controls:

Left/Right - Move

Up - Talk

Z - Jump (Used to go through Text)

X - Throw Knife

A - Select Knife

Credits:

Me - Programmer/Designer

Clay - Level Designer/Tester

https://twitter.com/Modeling_Cloy

Spooktune - Tester

https://twitter.com/Nderman080
